search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Avaza (avaza.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Avaza is: [https://www.avaza.com/pricing/](https://www.avaza.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Avaza Pricing - Projects, Timesheets, Invoices Done Right.

extracted_content.content:
Avaza Pricing - Projects, Timesheets, Invoices Done Right.
===============

Team Pricing Calculator
=======================

Number of Admin / Finance users?
--------------------------------

Full access to the system including all settings and managing finances.

2

120

Number of Timesheet & Expense users?
------------------------------------

Users with this role can track time & expenses.

5

1100

Number of Resource Scheduling Users?
------------------------------------

Assign this role to users so they can be scheduled in advanced project resource scheduling.

1

1100

Number of Team Members with Chat Access?
----------------------------------------

Assign this role to Team Members so they can participate in Direct and Channel discussions. Unlimited external contacts can participate for free.

5

1100

Number of Active Projects?
--------------------------

Unlimited Archived Projects

50

1100

### Basic Plan $23.95 USD

Total $23.95 USD per month

*   Unlimited Project Collaborators

--------------

*   Unlimited Project Collaborators

*   1 User with Resource Scheduling Access (Add more for $7 each /mo)

[Get Started Now](https://signup.avaza.com/?)

[Pricing Calculator](https://www.avaza.com/pricing/#)

All Plans Include
-----------------

*   Regular free updates
*   Automatic backups
*   Secure data protection

*   Access anytime, anywhere
*   Responsive mobile design
*   iPhone, iPad, Android friendly

*   No contracts
*   No software install
*   No IT headaches

FAQs
----

Can I start for free?
---------------------

Yes absolutely. When you create your account you start on the free plan. No credit card details are required.  
When you’re ready, you can upgrade your team to a paid plan.

How can I pay for my Avaza subscription?
----------------------------------------

You can pay for your Avaza subscription via Credit Card (Visa/MasterCard/AMEX) or Paypal.

What do the different user roles mean?
--------------------------------------

Project users can create and respond to tasks. Chat users can instantly message teams & customers in Channels & Direct Chats. Timesheet/Expense users can create and submit timesheets & expenses. Scheduling users can be scheduled to work on projects via our Resource Scheduling module. Fiance users can perform invoice,  bills, payment and credit functions. Admin users can access all Avaza functionality. [Read more](https://support.avaza.com/managing-users-contacts/).

Can I add more Admin / Finance users?
-------------------------------------

Yes, you can add more Admin/Finance users to your account for $7 per user per month. This can be done from the Avaza Subscription page.

What are your plan periods?
---------------------------

All our paid plans are billed monthly from the day you upgrade to one of our paid plans. For instance, if you upgrade to a paid plan on 15th March your account will be charged on the 15th of each month.

Can I downgrade or cancel my plan?
----------------------------------

Yes! Downgrading is easy. Just make sure your account is within the allowed limits of the lower plan. Please note you cannot downgrade plans or addons for 1 day after adjusting your subscription. It will be a shame to see you leave but you can cancel your subscription at any point. Just [contact support](https://www.avaza.com/contact/) and we will process your request.

How do I upgrade to a paid subscription?
----------------------------------------

It’s easy! After sign-up, go to the Manage \>Subscription page and choose a more powerful plan.

### **Build a more productive team with Avaza.**
